metadata.title: DianaL Boutique Cross and Anchor Engraved Stretch Bracelet Faith Hope Love
features: Faith Hope Love Inspiration Bracelet with Cross and Anchor Charms
Fits up to 7.5 " Wrist . Elastic Stretch .
Gold & Silver Plated . Nickel Free . Hypoallergenic .

Makes a Perfect Gift for Birthday , Christmas , Valentine Day , Mother's Day , Shower and other Special Days . This is a lovely way to show your best friend , girlfriend , wife , mother and someone dear to your heart that you care
Gift Boxed Will make an Amazing Gift !
description: This is a Beautiful Faith Hope Love Inspiration Bracelet with Cross and Anchor Charms . This bracelet comfortably fits up to 7.5 inches Wrist , it is elastic Stretch and very easy to put on . Gift Boxed. Will make a Great Gift !
